analysis.description:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#948-953) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#952-953)

JavvyCrowdsale.token (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1347) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#966)

JavvyCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol)
	-token.transferFrom(_sourceAddress,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1215-1226) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1219-1221)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1233-1241) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1241)

JavvyCrowdsale.getStage (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1349-1360) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- blockTime < closingTime (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1356-1360)
	- blockTime < openingTime (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1354-1355)
	- blockTime < icoStartTime (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1355-1356)

JavvyCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1360-1406) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(getStartIco() > block.timestamp,ICO has to begin in the future) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1383-1385)
	- require(bool,string)(getEndIco() > block.timestamp,ICO has to end in the future) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4918ec06c75ca216f09ea931433641c3478d6820.sol#1385-1386)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(getStartIco() > block.timestamp,ICO has to begin in the future)
require(bool,string)(getEndIco() > block.timestamp,ICO has to end in the future)
